question:
You recently went to a concert and thought one of the singers was very good. You want to tell how you feel.
Write a letter to the singer.
In your letter:
say how you feel about his/her performance
give details of your music-related activities
explain how you would like him/her to help you with your music-related activities
Write at least 150 words.
text: I am Madhuri. I have recently attended your concert which was held in Jaipur on August15th,2019.

As I know Artists like encouragement and appreciations. I thought to write you to encourage you to do more in your life. That was really a splendid performance. Those claps were real and you deserve it.

Mind-blowing performance. I really can’t stop appreciating you. The best part in you is your astonishing vocals. I am really happy to attend your live performance. I would recommend my friends to subscribe to your channel in Youtube so that we get hear your voice anytime.

Furthermore, your song selection according to your voice makes us awe-struck  and I went back to my childhood, felt so alive. I learned Music at the age of 7 and wrote certain kind of songs and shayari’s which I have them with me till now. However, I didn’t get the opportunity to continue my music skills. I will be glad to discuss some of my lyrical writings and to get some help with you.

Also, I am currently working with non-governmental organization for disabled kids. As I am keen to music, there are some children here who likes listening to songs. I would request you to come and meet my children and expose your divine voice.
Thank you for your time. I will be awaiting for your response.
